thread.title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday

title: Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday
text: > Entertainment Bernie Sanders to appear on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Wednesday FILE - In this Nov. 9, 2013 file photo, Michael J. Fox attends A Funny Thing Happened On The Way To Cure Parkinson’s benefit for The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research, in New York. Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders will appear on ABC’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. Kimmel’s show said another guest that night will be Fox, whose first “Back to the Future” film is marking its 30th anniversary. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File)
